AC5E.ShowTooltipsHint: When a relevant option is selected, AC5e will show a helpful tooltip when hovering over the suggested Roll button or a generated message or both, summing up the reasons for that suggestion.
AC5E.ShowTooltipChatVisibility.Name: Show chat tooltips for
AC5E.ShowTooltipChatVisibility.Hint: 'All' - all actor rolls, 'None' - no rolls, 'Owned' - owned actors rolls, 'Players' -  player actors rolls; (the GM sees all)
AC5E.ExpandedConditionsHint: When checked, AC5e will attempt to automate some extra conditions, like Dodging, Hiding.
AC5E.AutoArmorName: AC5e armor proficiency and equipment stealth disadvantage.
AC5E.AutoArmorHint: When checked, AC5e will automatically process proficiency in the equipped piece of armor for ability, skills and save rolls (STR || DEX) and check equipment for the stealth disadvantage property.

AC5E.ActivityUse.Name: Item Use Checks
AC5E.ActivityUse.Hint: When the use of an item is not permitted, AC5e will 'Do nothing', just 'Warn' (notification) or 'Enforce' (roll cancellation + notification)

Armor.Enforce: is not proficient in the equipped armor and RAW cannot cast spells. Spell cancelled!
Armor.Warn: is not proficient in the equipped armor and RAW cannot cast spells.

Incapacitated.Enforce: is incapacitated and cannot use any actions. Action cancelled!
Incapacitated.Warn: is incapacitated and cannot use any actions.

Raging.Enforce: is raging and cannot cast spells. Spell cancelled!
Raging.Warn: is raging and cannot cast spells.

Silenced.Enforce: is silenced and cannot cast spells with verbal components. Spell cancelled!
Silenced.Warn: is silenced and cannot cast spells with verbal components.

AC5E.AutoRangedAttacksHint: 'Off': AC5e will not process any distance checks; 'Ranged checks only': AC5e will automatically process distance disadvantage/fail based on target distance and range values of item used to attack; 'Range + Nearby foes': Hostiles adjacent to attacker will impose disadvantage on ranged attacks.
AC5E.AutoExhaustionHint: When checked, and you are using the Legacy dnd5e rules, AC5e will automatically process the normal 5e Exhaustion condition rules.
AC5E.AutoEncumbranceHint: When checked, AC5e will automatically process the variant 5e Encumbrance rules. The GM must also select in the settings of the Dnd5e system, the Variant (encumbered & heavily encumbered) option, otherwise this will have no effect.

AC5E.Targeting.Name: Targeting options for attacks
AC5E.Targeting.Hint: When no or multiple targets are selected for an Attack, Damage, or similar roll, choose how AC5E should respond

MultipleTargetsAttack.Source: AC5E: Multiple targets selected. Results may be skewed. Using source actor data only.
MultipleTargetsAttack.Enforce: AC5E: Multiple targets selected. Roll cancelled!

NoTargetsAttack.Source: AC5E: No targets selected. Advantage/disadvantage may be inaccurate. Using source actor data only.
NoTargetsAttack.Enforce: AC5E: No targets selected. Roll cancelled!

AC5E.KeypressOverrideHint: The key binds for advantage, disadvantage, critical should override any calculations by AC5e (checked) or be added to the normal AC5e calculations (not checked).
AC5E.DebuggingHint: Just some useful logs for debugging while developing. Probably makes little sense for users to have it on :)

Enabled.Name: Colorful buttons
Enabled.Hint: Make your roll dialog buttons stand out. Default colors: #288bcc (background), white (text/border). Input user to use game.user.color (best for background). Input false/none/null/0 to turn off any of the available color pickers. Delete any field to fallback to defaults.

Background.Name: üé® Button background color
Background.Hint: Delete any string from the input to default to the game.user.color

Border.Name: üñçÔ∏è Button border color
Border.Hint: Delete any string from the input to default to white

Text.Name: üî§ Button text color
Text.Hint: Delete any string from the input to default to white

AC5E.EnvironmentalHazards.SettingsHint: Automate Burning and Suffocation conditions, based on the 2024 D&D 5e ruleset

flags.automated-condition-5e.crossbowExp.name: Crossbow Expert
flags.automated-condition-5e.crossbowExp.description: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with crossbows

flags.automated-condition-5e.sharpShoote.name: Sharpshooter
flags.automated-condition-5e.sharpShoote.description: No disadvantage for firing ranged weapons at long range or within 5 feet of an enemy

bonus.name: Roll gets bonus
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. eg bonus=1d4 + 5 - @abilities.dex.mod;

critical.name: Roll is critical (nat20 or crit damage)

advantage.name: Grant advantage to opponent's d20 rolls

bonus.name: Grant bonus to opponent's rolls
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Lead with the bonus= followed by a ; separator, eg bonus=1d4 + 5 - @abilities.dex.mod;

critical.name: Grant critical (nat20 or damage) to opponent's rolls

disadvantage.name: Grant disadvantage to opponent's d20 rolls

fail.name: Grant failure to opponent's d20 rolls

fumble.name: Grant fumble (nat1) to opponent's d20 rolls

success.name: d20 rolls against or caused by you succeed

advantage.name: An aura giving advantage
advantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format example for a save ACTIONTYPE and: radius=15;includeSelf;allies;str;cha; would give to all allies including self in 15ft radius advantage to strength or charisma saves.

bonus.name: An aura giving bonuses
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format example for initiative ACTIONTYPE and effect value of: radius=20;bonus=-source.abilities.cha.mod;target.statuses.surprised ALL within 20ft will have their rolls reduced by the source actor's cha mod if they are surprised

critical.name: An aura forcing critical (nat20 or damage)
critical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

disadvantage.name: An aura giving disadvantage
disadvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

fail.name: An aura forcing d20 rolls to fail
fail.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

fumble.name: An aura forcing d20 rolls to fumble
fumble.description: An aura around the actor that has the effect on. Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

success.name: An aura forcing success
success.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration//death/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions
